description.raw:
This allows you to test a homebrew formula modification in a pull request before merging it. I've tested it with the ignition-common components pull request that needs a new homebrew formula since it updates to ign-cmake1 and ign-math5:

* https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-common/pull-requests/109/components-part-6-use-ign-cmake1-and/diff
* https://github.com/osrf/homebrew-simulation/pull/394
* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_common-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64&build=183)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_common-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/183/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_common-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/183/

In order to run that test, I had to run the ignition dsl job to add the parameter:

* https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/_dsl_ignition/522/console

In order to run that test, I had to run the ignition dsl job to add the parameter:
